names.pinyin: ying er shi zhen shi ji fang yi

actions: Dries Dampness, generates flesh and stops itching.
Absorbs Dampness and clears Heat topically.
With Duan Shi Gao, topically as a powder for dermatological disorders.
Heals eczema, burns and ulcerated sores and wounds topically.

symptoms: Main sites involved: Elbow Knee and Neck
Lesions: Thickening and lichenification with ill-defined borders
Dry and cracked skin is likely
Slight bleeding or exudation after scratching
Itching is severe, especially at night
Skin is dry and rough with some scaling and localized itching

notes: Mix the first four ingredients together in powdered form. Add enough calcium hydroxide to melt the herbs and make into a paste. Then add the glycerine's. Dilute with up to 200 ml water and apply topically.
